aiDiagnosis.title: AI Medical Analysis
aiDiagnosis.description: Upload your analyses and get professional diagnosis with AI assistance
aiDiagnosis.uploadDescription: Upload medical analyses, X-ray images, or other medical documents
aiDiagnosis.uploadPrompt: Drag files here or click to select
aiDiagnosis.supportedFormats: We support PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC formats
aiDiagnosis.symptomsDescription: Describe your current symptoms in detail
aiDiagnosis.symptomsPlaceholder: For example: Headache, fever, cough, abdominal pain, and other symptoms...
aiDiagnosis.resultsDescription: Upload files and enter symptoms, then click the analyze button
aiDiagnosis.specialistDescription: Consultation with a general practitioner is recommended

recommendations.fever: If fever exceeds 38.5¬∞C, consult a doctor
recommendations.duration: If symptoms persist for more than 7 days, get checked

aiDiagnosis.selectChatPrompt: Select a chat or start a new one

aiDiagnosis.failedToLoadChats: Failed to load chat history. Please try again later.
aiDiagnosis.failedToLoadChat: Failed to load chat details. Please try again.
aiDiagnosis.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload PDF, JPG, or PNG files.
aiDiagnosis.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds 5MB limit. Please upload a smaller file.
aiDiagnosis.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to use this feature. Please log in.
aiDiagnosis.failedToSendMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.
aiDiagnosis.noInputProvided: Please provide symptoms or upload files to proceed.

emergency.title: Emergency Medical Help
emergency.alertDescription: If your life is in danger, call 103 immediately!
emergency.quickEmergencyDescription: Quick buttons for common emergency situations

emergency.symptomPlaceholder: What symptoms are you experiencing? Since when? Pain level? Describe in detail...

immediateActions.action3: Stay in a safe place and wait for help

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Diagno AI is an innovative platform providing medical diagnostics and doctor recommendations powered by artificial intelligence

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: The primary goal of the Diagno AI platform is to expand access to quality medical care and make healthcare services universally accessible using artificial intelligence technologies.
mission.description2: We aim to improve communication between doctors and patients, accelerate the diagnostic process, and enhance the healthcare system by providing remote medical services.

checklist.item3: Improving communication between doctors and patients

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The Diagno AI platform is built on the following core values

value1.title: Reliability and Security
value1.description: User data security and privacy are our top priorities. All data is encrypted and stored in compliance with medical standards.

value2.title: Quality and Accuracy
value2.description: Our AI algorithms are continuously improved and updated with the latest medical data. We strive for the highest level of accuracy.

value3.title: Speed and Convenience
value3.description: We provide users with fast and convenient access to medical care anytime, anywhere. 24/7 service is our core principle.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The experienced professionals behind the Diagno AI platform

member1.name: Dr. Alisher Karimov
member1.description: Cardiologist with 20 years of experience. Developed the idea and core concept of the Diagno AI platform.

member2.name: Dilnoza Rahimova
member2.description: Expert in artificial intelligence and medical data analysis. MIT graduate.

member3.name: Dr. Bobur Toshmatov
member3.description: Therapist and public health expert. Collaborated with the World Health Organization.

member4.name: Malika Usmonova
member4.description: Specialist with 8 years of experience in medical software and user experience.

history.title: Our History
history.description: The development journey of the Diagno AI platform

milestone1.title: Project Started
milestone1.description: The Diagno AI concept was formed, and initial research began.

milestone2.title: First Prototype
milestone2.description: Initial AI algorithms were developed and tested.

milestone3.title: Beta Version
milestone3.description: The platform was tested with a limited user base.

milestone4.title: Official Launch
milestone4.description: The Diagno AI platform was officially launched and introduced to the public.

milestone5.title: Expansion
milestone5.description: New features and services were added, with the user base exceeding 100,000.
